SELECT seq ,type ,review ,reviewTitle ,starRating ,member_seq ,defaultNy ,type_seq
FROM feedback WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq} AND type = #{type} AND review = #{review} AND reviewTitle = #{reviewTitle}
mapper.update: UPDATE feedback SET type = #{type}, review = #{review}, reviewTitle = #{reviewTitle}, starRating = #{starRating}, member_seq = #{member_seq}, defaultNy = #{defaultNy}, type_seq = #{type_seq} WHERE seq= #{seq}
